snippet.title: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia | Release Date Teaser
snippet.description:
The Last Hero of Nostalgaia is a satirical action-adventure, brought to life by a twisted and wicked tale. Coming to Xbox Series X | S, Xbox One & Steam on October 19th 2022.

Featuring hard but fair combat, character customization, unique battle armor and engaging narrative mechanics rich in lore, Nostalgaia plunges you into almost certain death at every turn.

Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1766100/The_Last_Hero_of_Nostalgaia/

Learn more about The Last Hero of Nostalgaia at https://playnostalgaia.com

Follow us @ https://twitter.com/playnostalgaia

Join the community on https://discord.gg/coatsink

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More from Coatsink - https://coatsink.com/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/coatsink
